BcTextField.label: Label
BcTextField.componentDocsDescription: Framework-level, highly customizable Material-UI TextField replacement. Supports appearance, size, status, loading, clear, password, email, responsive, and more.
BcTextField.loadingReadonlyDescription: Make input readonly instead of disabled when loading
BcTextField.missingPropsTableStoryDescription: Complete list of ALL props for BcTextField component. All props are available in the component but hidden from the controls panel for better performance and cleaner interface.
BcTextField.crossFieldValidationDescription: üîó Cross field validation and dependency management
BcTextField.mockOptionReactDescription: JavaScript library for building user interfaces
BcTextField.mockOptionMaterialUiDescription: React components for faster web development
BcTextField.mockOptionStorybookDescription: Tool for building UI components and pages
BcTextField.richTextEditorDescription: ‚ú® HTML formatting, links and colors supported
BcTextField.textFormattingDescription: üî§ Uppercase, lowercase, capitalize, title case transformations
BcTextField.textCounterDescription: üìä Real-time character, word, line and paragraph counter
BcTextField.advancedFeaturesDescription: üöÄ Rich text, formatting, counter and auto-resize

BcPhoneInput.componentDocsDescription: Material-UI based phone input component with country code selector. Responsive, status, loading, clear, i18n, accessibility and more.
BcPhoneInput.inheritanceDescription: Phone input component derived from BcTextField with phone-specific features added.
BcPhoneInput.label: Phone
BcPhoneInput.countryDescription: Selected country code (e.g. TR, US, DE, ...)
BcPhoneInput.enablePhoneFormattingDescription: Enable automatic phone number formatting based on selected country
BcPhoneInput.enableAdvancedValidationDescription: Enable advanced phone number validation with custom rules
BcPhoneInput.enableAutoCountryDetectionDescription: Enable automatic country detection using IP, geolocation, and timezone
BcPhoneInput.enablePhoneSuggestionsDescription: Enable phone number suggestions from history and contacts
BcPhoneInput.enablePhoneHistoryDescription: Enable phone number history tracking and suggestions
BcPhoneInput.enableAccessibilityDescription: Enable comprehensive accessibility features including screen reader support and keyboard navigation
BcPhoneInput.missingPropsTableStoryDescription: Complete list of ALL props for BcPhoneInput component. All props are available in the component but hidden from the controls panel for better performance and cleaner interface.
BcPhoneInput.missingPropsTableDescription: Complete list of ALL props for BcPhoneInput component. All props are available in the component but hidden from the controls panel for better performance and cleaner interface.
BcPhoneInput.missingPropsCountryList: List of countries for phone input
BcPhoneInput.missingPropsGetMask: Function to get phone mask for country
BcPhoneInput.missingPropsEnableAdaptiveUI: Enable adaptive UI based on context
BcPhoneInput.favoritesAndRecentsStoryDescription: Favorites and recently used countries are shown at the top of the country select. Try changing the country to see "Recents" update. Headers are automatically translated with i18n.
BcPhoneInput.multipleInputsStoryDescription: Multiple BcPhoneInput components with different country states. State types are CountryCode for full TypeScript safety.
BcPhoneInput.performanceTestStoryDescription: This story simulates a country list with 1000+ items and async loading. Render time is measured. Used for performance testing with large data.
BcPhoneInput.asyncCountryLoadingStoryDescription: Shows async country loading with 2 second delay. Countries are fetched from an API. Async country loading example.
BcPhoneInput.customValidationStoryDescription: Custom phone validation rules. TR numbers must start with 5 and be 10 digits, US numbers must be exactly 10 digits. Custom phone validation rules.
BcPhoneInput.advancedMonitoringDescription: Advanced monitoring and analytics features active
BcPhoneInput.mobileOptimizationsDescription: Mobile optimizations and haptic feedback active
BcPhoneInput.allAdvancedFeaturesDescription: All advanced features active: Advanced monitoring, mobile optimizations, advanced i18n, theme-aware styles, keyboard shortcuts
BcPhoneInput.voiceSearchDescription: Click microphone button for voice input
BcPhoneInput.qrCodeIntegrationPlaceholder: Click QR button to generate code
BcPhoneInput.qrCodeIntegrationDescription: Click QR button to generate QR code
BcPhoneInput.autoCountryDetectionPlaceholder: IP, geolocation and timezone based detection
BcPhoneInput.autoCountryDetectionDescription: IP, geolocation and timezone based country detection
BcPhoneInput.professionalShowcasePlaceholder: Formatting, validation, voice search, QR code, suggestions and more
BcPhoneInput.professionalShowcaseDescription: Formatting, validation, voice search, QR code, suggestions and more
BcPhoneInput.withCountrySelectAndMaskStoryDescription: Example that uses BcPhoneInput's own country select to make country selection and sets the selected country's mask value as a placeholder. When the country changes, the phone number is cleared and the new mask is shown as a placeholder.
BcPhoneInput.enablePhoneFormattingStoryDescription: Example demonstrating phone number formatting feature. Entered numbers are automatically formatted according to country format.
BcPhoneInput.enableAdvancedValidationStoryDescription: Example demonstrating advanced phone validation feature. Country-specific validation rules and real-time error messages.
BcPhoneInput.enableAutoCountryDetectionStoryDescripti: Example demonstrating automatic country detection feature. Country is automatically detected based on IP, geolocation and timezone information.
BcPhoneInput.enablePhoneSuggestionsStoryDescription: Example demonstrating phone suggestions feature. History numbers and similar number suggestions.
BcPhoneInput.enablePhoneHistoryStoryDescription: Example demonstrating phone history feature. Previously entered numbers are saved and suggested.
BcPhoneInput.getMaskStoryDescription: Phone number formatting with custom mask function. Custom mask format for each country.
BcPhoneInput.showMaskInPlaceholderStoryDescription: Feature to show mask value as placeholder. User sees what format they need to enter.
BcPhoneInput.favoriteCountriesStoryDescription: Favorite countries feature. Specified countries are shown at the top of the dropdown.
BcPhoneInput.fetchCountriesStoryDescription: Asynchronous country list loading feature. Country list is dynamically fetched from API.
BcPhoneInput.validatePhoneStoryDescription: Custom phone validation function. Country-specific validation rules can be defined.
BcPhoneInput.accessibilityStoryDescription: Enterprise accessibility features including screen reader support, keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, and high contrast mode.
BcPhoneInput.performanceStoryDescription: Performance tracking and optimization features including render time monitoring, memory usage tracking, and user interaction analytics.
BcPhoneInput.monitoringStoryDescription: Enterprise monitoring and analytics including real-time tracking, error reporting, user behavior analytics, and security monitoring.
BcPhoneInput.smartFeaturesStoryDescription: AI-powered smart features including smart placeholder generation, contextual validation, personalized suggestions, and adaptive UI.
BcPhoneInput.integrationStoryDescription: Enterprise integration hooks for form systems, validation frameworks, state management, event systems, and external APIs.
BcPhoneInput.enterpriseShowcaseStoryDescription: Complete enterprise showcase with all advanced features enabled: accessibility, performance tracking, monitoring, smart features, and integration hooks.

BcPasswordInput.componentDocsDescription: Material-UI based password input component. Supports password strength, rules, show/hide, responsive, status, i18n, accessibility and more.
BcPasswordInput.inheritanceDescription: Advanced input component derived from BcTextField with password-specific features added.
BcPasswordInput.label: Password
BcPasswordInput.missingPropsTableStoryDescription: Complete list of ALL props for BcPasswordInput component. All props are available in the component but hidden from the controls panel for better performance and cleaner interface.
BcPasswordInput.missingPropsEnableAdaptiveUI: Enable adaptive UI based on context
BcPasswordInput.enablePasswordStrengthDescription: Enable password strength analysis and visual indicators
BcPasswordInput.enablePasswordRulesDescription: Enable password validation rules and requirements
BcPasswordInput.enablePasswordGenerationDescription: Enable automatic password generation with customizable options
BcPasswordInput.showStrengthBarDescription: Show password strength bar and rules?
BcPasswordInput.enablePasswordHistoryDescription: Enable password history tracking and suggestions
BcPasswordInput.enablePasswordSuggestionsDescription: Enable password suggestions from history and contacts
BcPasswordInput.appearanceExamplesDescription: Explore different appearance styles of BcPasswordInput component
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip1: Premium: Use for important forms and premium features
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip2: Soft: Great for user-friendly interfaces and forms
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip3: Glass: Perfect for modern, overlay-style designs
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip4: Minimal: Ideal for clean, distraction-free interfaces
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip5: Neumorph: Use for contemporary, tactile designs
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip6: Underline: Best for simple, space-efficient layouts
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip7: Dark: Perfect for dark theme applications
BcPasswordInput.appearanceTip8: Borderless: Great for seamless, integrated designs

BcOtpInput.componentDescription: Material-UI based OTP input component. Multi-digit input, validation, responsive, status, i18n, accessibility and more.

BcOtpInput.label: OTP Code
BcOtpInput.helperText: Enter the OTP code sent to your device
BcOtpInput.keyboardShortcutsDescription: Shortcuts: Arrow keys (navigate), Backspace (clear), Enter (complete), Tab (next)

BcOtpInput.allAdvancedFeaturesDescription: All advanced features active: Keyboard shortcuts, auto complete, haptic feedback, advanced monitoring, mobile optimizations, advanced i18n, theme-aware styles

BcNumberInput.componentDescription: Material-UI based number input component. Number formatting, validation, increment/decrement, responsive, status, i18n, accessibility and more.

BcNumberInput.label: Number
BcNumberInput.onChangeDescription: Callback when the number value changes
BcNumberInput.onClearDescription: Callback when the clear button is clicked
BcNumberInput.onValidateDescription: Callback when the number is validated
BcNumberInput.fallbackLocaleDescription: Fallback locale if translation is missing
